text: śrī kṛṣṇa chaitanya prabhu dayā kara more
tomā vinā ke dayālu jagata mājhāre
translation: O Śrī Kṛṣṇa Chaitanya Mahāprabhu! Be merciful to me. Other than You, who is merciful in this world?

text: mo sama patita prabhu nā pāibe āra
translation: You descended to save the fallen souls. O Lord, You will not find another soul as fallen as I.

text: hā hā prabhu nityānanda premānanda sukhī
translation: O Nityānanda! You are overjoyed with divine love. Give me Your merciful glance. I am very sad.
O Advaita Gosāi, Lord of Sītā Ṭhākurāṇī! Be merciful to me. By Your mercy, I will reach Śrī Chaitanya and Nitāi.
O Gadādhar Paṇḍit, embodiment of love for Śrī Gaura! O oceans of mercy, Śrīvās Paṇḍit and Hari Dās Ṭhākur!

text: hā hā svarūpa sanātana rūpa raghunātha
bhaṭṭa-yuga śrī jīva hā prabhu lokanātha
translation: O Svarūp Dāmodar, Sanātan, Rūpa, Raghunāth Dās, Raghunāth Bhaṭṭa, Gopāl Bhaṭṭa, and Śrī Jīva! O Lokanāth Prabhu!
O Śrīnivās Āchārya Prabhu! Be merciful! Narottam Dās prays for the association of Rāmachandra Kavirāj.

text: (tava jana kṛpā māge ei adhama dāsa)
translation: O Śrīla Prabhupād, manifestation of Śrī Gaura! Be merciful. This fallen servant prays for the mercy of your associates.
